name: Ext_R2_SearchParameter_target
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.SearchParameter.target for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SearchParameter.target from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SearchParameter|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Types of resource (if a resource reference)
element.definition: Types of resource (if a resource is referenced).
element.comment: `SearchParameter.target` maps to R4B `SearchParameter.target`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Types of resource (if a resource reference)
element.definition: Types of resource (if a resource is referenced).
element.comment: `SearchParameter.target` maps to R4B `SearchParameter.target`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: One of the resource types defined as part of FHIR.
